name: Wormholes (Caladrel)
description: Wormholes was created for the 2020.1 Brackey's Game Jam. It is a simple platformer where the player must jump around and kill enemies. When the player enters a wormhole, they are teleported to another world where the gravity is reversed. The goal of the game is to get the highest score possible. Use "a" and "d" to move left and right and "w" to jump. Use the left mouse button to shoot. **Play in full screen**
